post:
I have this Dedicated server up for rental located in France, It has great specs and you can have any OS you wish installed.

> *Please note a customer ordered this from me thinking they could get windows 7 as the OS even though nowhere on my website did it say windows 7, anyway mistakes can be made this server has already been provisioned and is ready to go the cost would be £30 per month or best offer.

Sensible offers are welcome.

**Specs:**
1TB Disk
4GB Ram
Processor 1Core / 2 Threads
Processor speed 1.8Ghz
Network 100MBits per second
**
*please be aware you are paying for a monthly service and whatever you offer is for the first month only!******

Please reply with any offers!
